title: Catalytic performance and mechanism study of the isomerization of 2,5-dichlorotoluene to 2,4-dichlorotoluene
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8709-8717
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00223G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jiang-Tao Ma, Teng-Fei Meng, Zi-Yun Chen, Yu-Jun Zhu, Cheng Lian, Peng Wang, Ding-Hua Liu, Yu-Pei Zhao
The influence of a hydrothermally modified HZSM-5 catalyst on the isomerization of 2,5-dichlorotoluene (2,5-DCT) to 2,4-dichlorotoluene (2,4-DCT) was investigated from both experimental and simulation perspectives.
